entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 2:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: NW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind light except north 30 km/h over southern sections. High zero. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 20 km/h except southeast 30 near Bowen Island this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of hail in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
